isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 10 SPEED AND 15 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT, RTO, AND RTX SERIES - INSTALL - ROADRANGER VALVE

step1.para: Install the Roadranger valve cover over the four air lines and gear shift lever ( Figure 304).

figure.caption: Figure 304. Install Roadranger Valve Cover Over Air Lines and Gear Shift Lever

step1.para: Install the jam nut on the shift lever ( Figure 305). Thread the Roadranger valve on the shift lever and secure by tightening the jam nut against the Roadranger valve.

figure.caption: Figure 305. Install Jam Nut on Shift Lever

step1.para: Connect the red air line between the "S" or Supply port of the slave valve (inset, Figure 306) and the "S" port of the Roadranger valve.

figure.caption: Figure 306. Connect Red Air Line Between "S" or Supply Port of Slave Valve and "S" Port of Roadranger Valve

step1.para: Connect the green air line between the "L" or LO range port of the slave valve (inset, Figure 307) and the "H" port of the Roadranger valve.

figure.caption: Figure 307. Connect Green Air Line Between "L" or LO Range Port of Slave Valve and "H" Port of Roadranger Valve

step1.para: Connect the black air line between the "P" or Pilot port of the slave valve ( Figure 308) and the "P" port of the Roadranger valve.

figure.caption: Figure 308. Connect Black Air Line Between "P" or Pilot Port of Slave Valve and "P" Port of Roadranger Valve

step1.para: Connect the blue air line between the "SP" or Signal port of the Roadranger valve (inset, Figure 309) to the reduction port on the cylinder cover.

figure.caption: Figure 309. Connect Blue Air Line Between "SP" or Signal Port of Roadranger Valve and Reduction Port on Cylinder Cover

step1.para: Position valve cover on the Roadranger valve and secure by tightening the two mounting screws in the cover ( Figure 310).

figure.caption: Figure 310. Position Valve Cover on Roadranger Valve
